symc.name: QS_ALLEVENTS
symc.desc: An input, WM_TIMER, WM_PAINT, WM_HOTKEY, or posted message is in the queue. This value is a combination of QS_INPUT, QS_POSTMESSAGE, QS_TIMER, QS_PAINT, and QS_HOTKEY.

symc.name: QS_ALLINPUT
symc.desc: Any message is in the queue. This value is a combination of QS_INPUT, QS_POSTMESSAGE, QS_TIMER, QS_PAINT, QS_HOTKEY, and QS_SENDMESSAGE.

symc.name: QS_ALLPOSTMESSAGE
symc.desc: A posted message is in the queue. This value is cleared when you call GetMessage or PeekMessage without filtering messages.

symc.name: QS_HOTKEY
symc.desc: A WM_HOTKEY message is in the queue.

symc.name: QS_INPUT
symc.desc: An input message is in the queue. This value is a combination of QS_MOUSE, QS_KEY, and QS_RAWINPUT.

symc.name: QS_KEY
symc.desc: A WM_KEYUP, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYUP, or WM_SYSKEYDOWN message is in the queue.

symc.name: QS_MOUSE
symc.desc: A WM_MOUSEMOVE message or mouse-button message (WM_LBUTTONUP, WM_RBUTTONDOWN, and so on). This value is a combination of QS_MOUSEMOVE and QS_MOUSEBUTTON.

symc.name: QS_MOUSEBUTTON
symc.desc: A mouse-button message (WM_LBUTTONUP, WM_RBUTTONDOWN, and so on).

symc.name: QS_MOUSEMOVE
symc.desc: A WM_MOUSEMOVE message is in the queue.

symc.name: QS_PAINT
symc.desc: A WM_PAINT message is in the queue.

symc.name: QS_POSTMESSAGE
symc.desc: A posted message is in the queue. This value is cleared when you call GetMessage or PeekMessage, whether or not you are filtering messages.

symc.name: QS_RAWINPUT
symc.desc: A raw input message is in the queue. For more information, see Raw Input.

symc.name: QS_SENDMESSAGE
symc.desc: A message sent by another thread or application is in the queue.

symc.name: QS_TIMER
symc.desc: A WM_TIMER message is in the queue.
